Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Chemistry Products Performance Verifiers I & II
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Chemistry Products dTIBC Reagent, Calibrator Kit 29, and Performance Verifiers I & II for spectrophotometric quantitation of total iron-binding capacity in serum
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative measurement of total iron-binding capacity (TIBC) in human serum to aid differential diagnosis of anemia and iron-related disorders, calibration of VITROS Chemistry Systems for TIBC measurement, and monitoring of system performance
